title: Virgin Mountain Man
description: A Curvy Girl and Virgin Mountain Man Romantic ComedyWill the sexy city girl who inherits a mountain be the one to tame the virgin mountain man?THE INEXPERIENCED BACHELOR series are short, sweet, and steamy standalone romantic comedies about curvy women who fall for hot virgin guys. No cheating. No cliffhangers. HEA guaranteed.
author: Lana Dash
